name: The Lord of the Rings: Adventure Card Game
name_original: The Lord of the Rings: Adventure Card Game
description:
Build a deck of iconic Heroes and challenge the forces of Sauron in this thrilling tactical card game. Go forth and explore famous locations, complete story-driven quests, and forge your own legend of Middle-earth. But beware the Eye of Sauron—should you draw his attention, all will be lost…
- Form a fellowship of Heroes and iconic Characters and embark on new adventures throughout the lands of Middle-earth.
- Confront deadly Enemies from Sauron’s forces and solve story-driven Quests to progress through immersive Campaigns.
- Discover deep gameplay mechanics revealed through never-seen-before card battle features.
- Extend your adventures in Middle-earth through additional campaigns and face new challenges and foes with free Encounters, released regularly.
- Enjoy two thrilling campaigns already included! Save Bilbo from a terrifying spider in Shadow's Reach or investigate Spiders and Orcs working together in Southern Mirkwood in Shadow's Fall.
1 player
8GB minimum save size
